!! ABOUT US !! 

The To-Do List Maker is intended to assist clients in managing their daily schedules. It simplifies the 
process of organizing and tracking 
tasks by allowing clients to prioritize their work, set due dates 
and reminders, track progress on 
individual tasks, assign tasks to others, and create a recurring to-do list. The To-Do List Maker also makes it easier for these clients to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
